website_summaries.verdict: If you're handling cheesecakes and other larger, heavier cakes, choose this Nordic Ware lifter.
pros: 10-inch diameter head large enough to move most cakes
Spray lightly with cooking spray before each use to ensure cakes slide off easily
Non-stick coating cleans easily with hot soapy water
Great for separating cheesecake from spring-form bottom
Sturdy, but thin enough to slide under cakes
Offset handle makes moving cakes easier
cons: Combined weight of the heavy-duty lifter combined with cake is too heavy for some to lift

customer_reviews.title: Love this for the Breville Oven
customer_reviews.text: We use in a Breville oven for pizzas. Works well and fits nicely into the oven to get a pizza off a pizza stone. I have no idea about using it for cakes.
customer_reviews.author: mms.crazy

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bread baker and use this to transfer my dough to the bread cloche. I put parchment paper on it and then add my dough. It is very slippery so I will try it without the parchment paper. It does make the transfer of the dough much easier and the chance of burning myself has decreased. It's a nice addition to my bread making tools. Just be careful, it is slippery. (It's supposed to be). );
customer_reviews.author: S. Kahl

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Tools in my Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best tools in my kitchen! I love this thing. It's heavy, does its job, and much, much more. It's great not only for cakes, but for transferring those custard pies that always want to spill when you're putting them in the oven. Wonderful pie retriever, too. I'm impressed with all the Nordic Ware items I've bought, but this is - hands down - my favorite. I now consider it indispensable!
customer_reviews.author: catwomn

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to lift my bread dough into a hot Dutch oven for baking. Because the DO was hot, I had to drop it in inorder not to get burned and it flattened out my dough. Now I can slide the dough in and it comes out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn H. Mcadams

customer_reviews.title: great cake lifter, saves your layers from breaking. made in the usa
customer_reviews.text: great tool for making large cakes and lifting the layers without breaking. very hard to move large cake layers without breaking them. this is a great tool so that you dont end up having your beautiful layers crack...nordic ware is an amazing company and made in the usa!
customer_reviews.author: scoobydoo

customer_reviews.title: Quesadilla flipper extraordinaire!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to remove a cheesecake from the bottom of a springform pan. But if you like quesadillas and don't have a spatula big enough to flip them without throwing half the ingredients around the kitchen, buy this! I dreaded making quesadillas tonight until I remembered I had this. I listed the edge of the quesadilla with a spatula and slid this underneath it - perfect size and it flipped it beautifully. No lost ingredients, no foldovers. Yay! Non-stick, extremely sturdy, ergonomic, and cleans like a dream. You can never go wrong with anything Nordic Ware.
customer_reviews.author: ChattyCat

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for More than Intended!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid cook, and find this kitchen utensil invaluable for many things I often make. It is wonderful at transferring a cooled cake layer from a cooling rack onto a decorating turntable for frosting purposes. It prevents cracking and splitting, thus, helping create the perfect cake. I also use it to move uncooked pies and then removing the cooked pie from the oven, preventing damaged fluted pie crusts. It is marvelous for placing frozen pizzas directly onto the oven rack, then removing the finished product intact. If something were to happen to this handy gadget, I'd replace it in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Meek

customer_reviews.title: A great cake lifter! Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother and actually had occasion to use it not long ago. It is sturdy enough to lift pies (I was making pecan pies for a sale) and the handle is situated so you are not cringing thinking you are going to accidently touch the rack. I am amazed and my mother is actually happy, which is rare!
customer_reviews.author: Cat4life

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Needs One in Their Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is the handiest thing in the kitchen now for me! I can lift springform cheesecakes out now, without ruining the bottom or sides! Works great for any cakes to move to a cake plate. It is much heavier than I thought it would be, and the handle is extra nice, with a good grip on it. It has an overall nonstick coating, but directions say to spray with a flour/oil cooking spray. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cake lifter!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cake lifter! The size is perfect for all my cakes, even if they are a bit bigger than the lifter. It is sturdy and yet thin enough to easily slide under my layered cake slices. The non-stock surface let’s the cake slices slide easily onto a turn table. Cleaning the lifter could not be easier. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Malena

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered at night and it arrived first thing in the morning! Unbelievable... I was making a pizza tomorrow, so this is perfect. Instead of the baking pan, I used pizza stone and this lifter to drop in my artisan bread today. Bread is better ever! I’ll be using this a lot for my daily bread making...
customer_reviews.author: Quro’s mum

customer_reviews.title: A big help!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter asked for this for Christmas and it was put to work immediately! It has made transferring her cakes from one place to another much easier than before. Even dense, heavy cakes don't seem to be an issue - it's strong and durable. Being a cake lifter it's easy to clean. Warm soapy water will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Seccombe

customer_reviews.title: Heavy But Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like the product I notice this particular brand on a lot of baking shows but for me the thickness should have been a little less for it is difficult to slip it under my decorated cakes without damaging them.
customer_reviews.author: TheCarefulShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beast. If you can't lift your cake or cookies using this then you must have used cement instead of flour in your batter, even then, this could probably handle it. Not too heavy but very sturdy and very well made. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy N.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty cake lifter makes it easy to transfer layers
customer_reviews.text: This is a really substantial cake lifter. It’s somewhat heavy, but is great for heftier cakes because it does not bend or flex at all. The instructions recommend coating the surface with cooking spray to allow things to slide on and off more easily, so it’s a little more troublesome to wash off cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: davidthawaii

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use it when I make a cake or pie in a spring-form pan that I give as a gift or take to a party. I slide the lifter between the cake/pie bottom and the bottom of the pan and lift it out then slide it off the lifter onto a pretty cardboard serving board. No worries about having to return a cake/pie plate to me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cockrell

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I bake cakes for birthdays and weddings; this makes lifting a whole cake so much easier even when stacking them! Great for pizza too! I will probably be purchasing another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann C. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Lifts round and square cake layers
customer_reviews.text: Cake lifter works as advertised. The metal is stiff enough to hold the cake and not flex, but you will need a strong grip. The protruding handle makes it awkward to store. I manage to store it in a deep drawer on top of my cake pans with the handle facing downward to save on space. This kitchen accessory isn't an absolute must have but it is useful. You can substitute a cardboard cake round like the professionals use, but those aren't reusable and you have to buy it from the local bakery or order a gigantic lifetime supply from the restaurant supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Ursine

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had gotten this years ago
customer_reviews.text: This cake lifter is wonderful! I'm able to cut my cakes into very thin layers without worrying about cracking them. I just use my cake leveler to cut through the cake, slide this underneath to move the upper layer out of the way, ice the lower layer, then use this to slide the layer back on top. It's very sturdy and thin enough to easily slide between the cut layers. It's also sturdy enough to hold a 9" fondant covered cake tier (which can be pretty heavy).
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE for Cooks and Bakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tool for lifting desserts and appetizers, especially cheesecakes and Brie en Croute. It has a generous round bottom, is sufficiently sturdy to lift heavy cheesecakes and large items like pizzas and my Brie en Croute. Would do great with larger regular cake as well. May want to secure it by holding the end opposite the handle if product is very heavy. Stores away easily along the side wall of my bottom cupboard. Great purchase for a great price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tool works great on cakes
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter; she saw mine and said she sure could use one of these in her kitchen. This tool works great on cakes, pizzas, and husbands (LOL). Plus being Nordic Ware, it's made in the USA. Even though this lifter isn't something you'll use every day (unless you bake a lot of cakes), it's one of those tools that when you need it, you need it, nothing else works as well, and that makes it a great value.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Maclean

customer_reviews.title: Pizza
customer_reviews.text: I use this to take pizza out of the oven after baking it. Just need to be careful since it’ll slip off if you don’t hold it sturdy, but works great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: CAKE LIFTER WILL DO WHAT THE DESCRIPTION SAYS IT WILL DO
customer_reviews.text: This cake lifter is heavy, sturdy, and will lift a cake and the cake will stay on it until you are ready to put it somewhere else. I would recommend this lifter, especially, if you are a cake maker. I like a utensil that will do what the description says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: sjctenn

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for layer cakes. I think Nordic Ware produces some of the best products on the market, have had the best experiences with their products.
customer_reviews.author: RBC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for cake AND pizza
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what we'd do without this handy little tool in our kitchen. I bought it while taking a cake decorating class, and while it's certainly be used for cakes, it's been used much more frequently for pizza. The sturdiness and thin edge makes it perfect for scooting underneath a hot pizza quickly, which is crucial when you want to leave your 500 degree oven open for as short a time possible. And though we use it regularly with our pizza stones, it doesn't appear to sustain many scratches. I haven't tried putting it in the dishwasher though -- it's so easy to wash by hand I figured why bother risking it?
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this !product
customer_reviews.text: Made very well. Works great as a pizza peel. Ordering another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pottertacke

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: Not big enough for a large pizza but for 1 person, a 10-12" pizza is ok. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: hombre243Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Strong, perfect size for your average round cake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cake lifter to help transport cake layers from the decorating stand to the cake platter when making a friend's wedding cake. I'm so glad I purchased this one because it can handle the heavier, denser cakes much better than the cheap plastic ones. Note that it will easily lift a 2-layer cake but a 3 layer might be pushing it unless it's on the smaller side. If you're using it for pizza it would definitely work for that.
customer_reviews.author: D. McCain

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is sturdy. Scratch easily. Too expensive for what the product is.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gadget because I wanted to be able to lift cheesecakes off from the base to put on a plate so I don't scratch the spring form pan when I cut the cake. Works perfectly! Surprise - I also use it to transfer cookies from the pan to the rack and to transfer cakes from rack to plate. What a handy gadget!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what the baker ordered
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who would always have problems moving her cake layers from the cooling racks to a turntable to frost or a cake safe to store. This tool makes her job very easy to transfer the layers and line them up on the stack - no more off-center layers. This product is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bressi

customer_reviews.title: Howeverrrrr she has a new found love for the square cake lifter
customer_reviews.text: Wifes review- She loved/loves it! Howeverrrrr she has a new found love for the square cake lifter, especially when lifting a cake to place onto another tier. This one is great though. The handle and base are all solid and of good construction. These are tools though, and as tools go, they all have their purpose of making the job at hand easier. What?
customer_reviews.author: John1kim

customer_reviews.title: though I did get good at frosting patch work
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I get one years ago! I have broken so many cake layers in all my years of baking, though I did get good at frosting patch work! This lifter is so good at getting under a layer, without scraping the bottom off. It makes it so easy to put a layer on top of a layer! I use it to gather up cookies on the cookie sheet. I get a lot of baking use out of this lifter!
customer_reviews.author: DelicateRaptor6

customer_reviews.title: I will never worry about flipping or lifting a cake again
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift form the heavens. Taking a cake out of the pan or moving it to a plate just got alot easier. I was elated when I found this and I am glad that I purchased it. It is Nordic Ware so you can expect the same high level of quality as their other products. It did take some time to get use to balancing the cake but once I got use to it, it was a piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dinkins

customer_reviews.title: Works for pizza
customer_reviews.text: I use this for taking pizza out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for stacking tiers
customer_reviews.text: This is great for placing the bottom tier on a cake board and the other tiers on top of it. I just chill the cakes, then lift and push them right off of this. Sturdy and washes easily
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cake lift. It’s heavier than I thought it would be and that’s a good thing. It’s well make. I wish the company made even bigger sizes for larger cakes too. It’s not a long handle but it works great for transferring round layer cakes. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jama

customer_reviews.title: 10 inched
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it yet but it washed up nice. can't wait to use it :-)
customer_reviews.author: pennie

customer_reviews.title: Love it, makes handling heavy cakes and cheesecakes so much easier
customer_reviews.text: Love Nordic Ware and this piece didn't disappoint. It's essential for the home Baker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifts cake
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly smooth finish. Easy to use and clean. Lifts cake just as you would want from a cake lifter. Doesn’t flex enough to crack even a hot sponge cake, yet still enough to get it under easily.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rabun

customer_reviews.title: Better than a pizza peel/lifter
customer_reviews.text: I brought this to use in place of a pizza peel and found that this is an awesome product! It's very large and can easily scoop a small size pizza. But I've also used it to hold bead loafs, cookies, muffin pans, and use it move around cakes like it was intend for. Great versatility with this and I love that is non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: N. R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Usefuk
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! I love the size and the sturdiness. Not just for cake - I used it to place my pie crust over the filling without breaking the dough. I am very happy and definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: TravelnFam

customer_reviews.title: Nice to find something well-made!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cake lifter. We use it mostly for pizza. The only thing I can say is that the pizza could slide off easily, so you have to be careful. It wouldn't work well as a cake lifter if they changed it to make it tougher for something to slide off, so I wouldn't expect any change there, nor would I want it really - it's heavy-duty and really well made. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Runyan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy cake lifter
customer_reviews.text: When I received this, I was amazed at just how sturdy this was. It works great in lifting cakes and now I am wondering why I never bought one of these many years ago when I used to do all kinds of cakes. I think if you make this purchase and are a serious cake baker, you will not be sorry. I have other items by Nordic Ware and have always been pleased with them. Quality all the way!
customer_reviews.author: 4u2

customer_reviews.title: Best in Class
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful to move cakes from a spring form pan to a plate!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy cake lifter.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how sturdy this cake lifter is. It should last a life time. I'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: BEST DECISION I'VE MADE IN A LONG TIME
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I don't know what I was doing without it all this time. It's good and sturdy, and the balance is good. If the cake is kind of sticky, the lifter won't go all the way through, but it still holds the cake well...like a spatula under a pancake.
customer_reviews.author: King'sCrown

customer_reviews.title: Love my cake lifter!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mom of a 2 year old and decided to make his birthday cake this year - three layers. I never knew cake lifters existed but let me tell you they are a HUGE help! The bottom layer was 10in and this lifted that without any issues - filled and layered. Yes this is a little lofty but so versatile. Good quality - will hold up for a long time and I will find many uses for it. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Love this product! Many type of uses
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I use it for my catering company. High quality and great size
customer_reviews.author: J. Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Really neat...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old wooden pizza peel that had cracked from age and wear. This is plenty sturdy to enable you to lift a pizza or a loaf of bread in and out of the oven. It is large enough but not over sized. It has a very nice "rubber" handle that fits the hand very nicely. I probably won't use it to lift cakes, but it will definitely be used for pizzas at my house.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Geiman

customer_reviews.title: what is it good for?
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a pretty good idea for moving cakes from rack to plate or plate to plate. But it's so heavy, it really isn't practical. It might work for a single layer, but the weight of the lifter plus a whole cake is too much. I think it might work well for pizza or something like that, but I haven't tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Joa429

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Way heavier than I thought. Very well made. Happy with this purchase for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nordic Ware Cake Lifter
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the quality of this product and the way it is made it does not interfere with lifting the cake from the pan. The product is sturdy, beautiful, saw this as I took it out of the box. Lifted cake, perfect transfer. I highly recommend this product; I purchased a big round one for my heavy NY cheesecake. Made in USA! Nordic Ware makes nice products; you will be pleased. JoAnn, Absecon, NJ
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Cake Lifter
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much because the price was very good and it works for all the lifting i do of my kitchen created edibles, such as braided, twined, or long loaved breads; sheet cakes and round cakes...and anything else that needs care and attention in lifiting. Good product...of course i use two depending on how long or heavy the item is...a sheet for example will need support from both sides...i also do have a long, wide, professional off-set spatula and a large square lifter. All three serve their purpose in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, Non-Stick Great Lifter
customer_reviews.text: I am baking bread and was in need to buy a one loaf lifter. So, I purchased it and it was great. It's made for the heavy duty work. It has excellent manufacture and finish. It's really non-stick lifter. I am baking the healthy fine Brain bread and using it for lifting all loafs. I love it. I recommend it for bakers who they are making breads and cake.
customer_reviews.author: Abbas Fathy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't be without it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for moving a cake from one surface to another, and (BONUS) it also works well for pizza. It has a non-stick surface, but not the type with a coating that will scratch or peel off. Very sturdy and well made. Love it! Don't know why I waited so long to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't use it often...but when you need it, it works.
customer_reviews.text: Product fulfilled all expectations. Don't make a multi tier cake without it.
customer_reviews.author: old school

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: This makes it so much easier to transfer cakes from the decorating spin table to the cake holder. I love it! The only downside is that it's a bit heavy. But other than that it's super smooth going under the cake, doesn't bother the cake at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Beck

customer_reviews.title: Hendy tool for making layered, tiered cakes! Very heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item when I was making a multi-tier wedding-style cake for my parent's 60th wedding anniversary party. I was very impressed with the quality of the product, and was surprised by it's weight! It's really sturdy! I know I would have had a problem assembling my cake without this item, and I'm glad I made the investment.
customer_reviews.author: exparrot

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Gray size to lift entire cake. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BIG Help for the Baker
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller one of these and lent it to my Grandson. Didn't get it back and didn't realize I had ordered the super sized which I like much better. Very handy when unseating cakes from pans or separating cheesecake from the bottom of the pan after the sides are removed. No mishaps with this big lifter.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H. Barker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little tool.........
customer_reviews.text: You don't need something like this often, but when it's needed.......IT IS NEEDED and becomes a godsend. I had the Wilton version of this prior to this purchase and sent this one to my sister. THIS ONE IS THE BEST VERSION! I'm getting another for me. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen use
customer_reviews.text: Gift for the wife who likes to bake.She was impressed with the quality, price and quick shipping service. Claims it has multiple kitchen uses
customer_reviews.author: John W. Moon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This cake lifter is heavier than I had expected. I have no doubt it will withstand your heavier cakes and desserts.
customer_reviews.author: MstrssGrim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful nonstick surface to transfer my cakes. I've had no issues with it. Slips off like a charm & exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Selena H

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this product. Works well & is efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Personal Acct

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Not much else to add aside from what everyone has mentioned this is a strong sturdy product and I use it to lift my cakes, pies etc. in/out of the oven with no accidents. I also use it when stacking cakes, I lift it and put it in on the next tier with no problems. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Sprinklesღ♥^_^

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy tool, more than I expected which is great!
customer_reviews.author: LRS

customer_reviews.title: If you make lots of cakes...
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine. I dont think I will use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: This product made it much easier to move the cake layers.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Pizza
customer_reviews.text: Easy taklng pizza outta the oven,,No Mess, No Mistakes And Small enough to put in oven with your pots n pans.If you make your own 12 inch Pizza it works great. I wouldnt recomend doing this on as 14 or 16 inch pizza though .Highly recomend this to moms who cook pizza for their kids at a cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D

customer_reviews.title: this is a great deal for doing layer cake hot or cold i ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great deal for doing layer cake hot or cold i love the way this handlers
customer_reviews.author: willie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for pizzas on our grill stone. Nice and heavy duty, does not bend or flex easily. I highly recommend this if you do pizzas on stones and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect. Exactly what I hoped for. Seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, very this and sturdy, doesn't bend at all with cake:)
customer_reviews.author: Allybailey

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: I'm a senior, so I had my son move a heavy cake to a pretty pedestal dish. A little awkward using the single handle. It was sturdy however.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Lifted 3 layer 10 inch cake with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: casey walker

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed. Every baker should have one.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I ordered this! I had a cake lifter by Wilton that just seemed to flimsy for all of my heavy pound cakes. This lifter does the trick and has great weight to it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshyne_Red

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Well made and good in theory, however for me it's difficult because with the weight of it plus the weight of the cake (used with a dense carrot cake) it was extremely heavy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: love it!

customer_reviews.title: cool product
customer_reviews.text: Good firm lever handle. I strongly encourage this lifter. it is some what flexable but not so much that is feels like the cake will fall off. I saw many products out there but this is the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Swiderski

customer_reviews.title: This one seems very sturdy and heavy duty and no sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: This one seems very sturdy and heavy duty and no sharp edges, and has a safe handle. Christmas gift. Hope she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: susan bartnick

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this a long time ago!!!! It is extremely sturdy and I was able to pull a cake out of the oven with no problems...be careful though, it's nonstick and your cake could simply slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works the way it should design fir lifting cakes and pies
customer_reviews.author: Ora Alger

customer_reviews.title: Large Spatula
customer_reviews.text: I got this cake lifter for my daughter for Christmas. She is a baker extroidinaire and will find many ways to use this supersize spatula. The quality as usual for Nordic Ware is excellent. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Le Grant

customer_reviews.title: Really like it, wouldn't have any other cake lifter
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, no bending or flimsiness to it. Really like it, wouldn't have any other cake lifter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Useful Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister. She is a baker. She uses it all the time and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: P Payne

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This works ok but is actually a little too heavy for me but luckily my husband thinks it works well for him. Well constructed overall.
customer_reviews.author: P. Asche

customer_reviews.title: and it works great for that
customer_reviews.text: Brought to use as a pizza peel, and it works great for that. Nice weight and angle of the handle feels good in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: PKG1955

customer_reviews.title: Good Simple Straight Forward Cake Lifter
customer_reviews.text: Good cake lifter and works perfectly. No bells or whistles. But does the job Great!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Slagle

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Great item, many uses. Easy to clean. The whole family likes to use it and see how many different things they can use it for!
customer_reviews.author: jeeje

customer_reviews.title: it was awesome.
customer_reviews.text: really worked well when stacking my pineapple upside down cake on top of my cheese cake. it was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: SUZANNE SCAFIRE

customer_reviews.title: Nordic Ware Cake Lifter
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you make cakes. Where have you been all my life? It makes lifting the cakes out of the pan so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyAtl

customer_reviews.title: Just works.
customer_reviews.text: Just another boring five-star review for this cake lifter. Light, sturdy, excellent size, and no sticking. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Molay

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great pizza spatula
customer_reviews.text: Love it I use it as a pizza Spatula to get my pizzas out of the oven
customer_reviews.author: Angelia

customer_reviews.title: Cake Lifter
customer_reviews.text: These are hard to find. I tried many retail locations and I was only able to find this product on Amazon. My wife loves it. Need I say more!!!
customer_reviews.author: phr324

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Cake Lifter
customer_reviews.text: I used this to assist in making a four-layer m&m pinata cake for a friend's birthday. That sucker was heavy! But this lifted it right up without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: leslie beslie

customer_reviews.title: Cake lifting made easy
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to get one of these? It makes moving layers so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Harvey S. Trop

customer_reviews.title: Cake lifter beyond words--sturdy too for those heavy jobs!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! Wonderful!! No more damaged cakes. Slide it under, lift off, and place it on serving platter. I use this for my cheesecakes---so easy to move it from baking pan to serving plate.
customer_reviews.author: Helen J Tarr

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I torte my cakes and it is great! My husband also likes to use it to get pizzas from the oven. It's sturdy and a decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I was using a regular spatula before, this is much better!
customer_reviews.author: N. Trapp

product_meta.title: Nordic Ware Cake Lifter, 10-Inches
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1| Style:WhiteNon-stick finish makes transferring your cakes a snap. Perfect for lifting cakes to a platter after frosting to maintain the beauty of your creation. Spatula design is large enough for most cakes. Proudly made in the USA by Nordic Ware.
feature_bullets: Large cake lifter for transporting frosted cases to serving platter
Wide 10 inch diameter head is big enough for most cakes
Spray lightly with cooking spray before each use to ensure cakes slide off easily
Non-stick coating cleans easily with hot soapy water
Made in the USA with Imported handle
